email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is October 15-20. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Given the current market, we were hoping for something in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Can you check with the owner and get back to me? Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I spoke with the owner, and they are willing to come down to $51.25 per metric ton. This is their best offer given the current market conditions. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for following up. $51.25 is acceptable. Let’s proceed with the MV Ocean Star. Can you confirm the laycan and provide the demurrage terms? Also, please send over the draft charter party for review. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. The laycan remains October 15-20. Demurrage is set at $25,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll send over the draft charter party by end of day today. Let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The demurrage terms are acceptable. I’ll review the charter party once received and get back to you with any comments. Looking forward to finalizing this. Cheers, John.
